A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie I have ever seen. I have never left a review before but feel a need to in order to save the Star Wars series I love. If u want a movie that has gigantic plot holes\, Leia flying like Mary Poppins through space\, and boring characters\, you have come to the right place. Half of the movie could have been deleted if Poe was just told Leai's and that pink hair ladie's plan. Btw she didn't have to sacrifice her life. Ur telling me they didn't have auto pilot on that ship? I digress. Also the prolonged terrible casino scene would have never had to have happened if Poe was told the plan. Who is Snoke? What is his purpose? Nobody knows. Bored the whole time and felt like my childhood had been ruined. Ruined Luke's character. It's hurts me to say this\, but I don't think I will be seeing the third movie. Nothing made me want to see what happens next in this trilogy after seeing this movie.
